content:
Srshdiyilanpudayon kaatti-shakthi, athi-ngkal
Vishvaasam, kurivayattor-thanne nindichu
/tpangkilagaathram-thaan nirmmalamaakki
/tsundaranaayi-ttaa naranezhunnettu
Vismayaveekshana harshatthaal-janamudghoshichu
Maanavarakshaykkaagathane!-kartthaave! Nyangall
/thaaleluyyaa-sthothram cheyyunnu.
